short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a structured interface for manipulating URLs. Makes the URL selecting process simple and convenient.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin allows users to modify or add parameters within the URL. Users can easily edit existing parameters, add new ones, or remove unnecessary parameters.
